about_the_game:
Sylvester and the entity of Dust is an Action RPG game with Rogue Lite mecamism. Embark on an epic adventure in stunning 3D isometric view, powered by the graphical power of Unreal Engine 5.

Demo version limited to the first biome.
detailed_description:
Sylvester and the entity of Dust is an Action RPG game with Rogue Lite mecamism. Embark on an epic adventure in stunning 3D isometric view, powered by the graphical power of Unreal Engine 5.

Demo version limited to the first biome.

fullgame.name: Sylvester and the entity of Dust

legal_notice: Sylvester and the entity of Dust developed by RB Studio Game. Powered by Unreal Engine 5.
name: Sylvester and the entity of Dust Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 4060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Play as Sylvester on his odyssey to save Gaïa from the entity of Dust.In this game you will play as Sylvester, a Golem that Gaïa has sent to save the world from an infection.An action RPG game integrating Rogue Lite dimensions.Join the odyssey!Demo version limited to firsts levels.
